description_en: We are experts in technology, delivering smart solutions that solve business challenges and create value. Our award-winning teams apply deep expertise and passion to deliver complex IT projects globally. With 2,000 technical experts based in our development centers in Vietnam, we have extensive knowledge and capability in all areas of technology for even the largest enterprise. NashTech is a division of Harvey Nash Group. We operate in Europe, UK, USA, Australia, Singapore, Vietnam and Japan. Whether youâ€™re looking to increase the capacity of your existing tech team or want to outsource a project to a specialized partner, NashTech has a model tailored to your specific business needs.
